clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in alzheimer s disease hearing loss and pain acute or chronic

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Neramexane is similar to memantine and acetylcholinesterase inhibitors in that neramexane targets the cognitive decline in Alzheimer s Disease by altering neurotransmitter signaling but not the underlying pathological mechanisms that cause the disease amyloid production or neurofibrillary tangle accumulation
